from typing import Dict
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from sklearn.metrics import ConfusionMatrixDisplay



[docs]
def save_bar_counts(df, label_col, out_path: str):
    counts = df[label_col].value_counts().sort_index()
    labels = ["ham(0)", "spam(1)"]
    values = [counts.get(0, 0), counts.get(1, 0)]
    plt.figure()
    plt.bar(labels, values)
    plt.title("Ham vs Spam counts")
    plt.ylabel("Count")
    plt.savefig(out_path, bbox_inches="tight")
    plt.close()

def save_confusion_matrix(y_true, y_pred, out_path: str, title: str):
    plt.figure()
    disp = ConfusionMatrixDisplay.from_predictions(y_true, y_pred)
    plt.title(title)
    plt.savefig(out_path, bbox_inches="tight")
    plt.close()

def summarize_results(results: Dict[str, Dict]) -> str:
    lines = ["model,accuracy,precision,recall,f1"]
    for name, m in results.items():
        lines.append(f"{name},{m['acc']:.4f},{m['p']:.4f},{m['r']:.4f},{m['f1']:.4f}")
    return "\n".join(lines)
